reviews.review_msg: Professor Higgins is awesome! She relates her personal experiences in the field of archeology to the topic whenever appropriate. She doesn't rely on only papers for project grades. We did multimedia projects for my class. She has "required" reading but not really since the readings are to contextualize the topic of study.
Great lectures as she cares about the material. She marks her assignments fairly as well as the midterm for this course. The only negative in this course is a decent amount of library research.
